title: Gambler’s Round
desc:
Post 77
- The target and shooter roll a d2, a d4, or a d8.
 - If you roll a 1, lose 1 <:charge:1240849067362488403>.
 - If you roll a 2, choose an <:item:1240853872336179310> to lose; gain an <:item:1240853872336179310>.
 - If you roll a 3, lose 2 <:charge:1240849067362488403>.
 - If you roll a 4, gain 1 <:charge:1240849067362488403>.
 - If you roll a 5, your next turn is skipped.
 - If you roll a 6, steal an <:item:1240853872336179310> from the target/shooter. If the target/shooter has no items, roll for one.
 - If you roll a 7, lose 3 <:charge:1240849067362488403>.
 - If you roll an 8, gain 2 <:charge:1240849067362488403>.
- The shooter may also choose to swap the results of both players, at the cost of one <:charge:1240849067362488403>.
